activities.message:
Hi @ivarsvids 

thank you for reporting this!

We will be looking into it and issue a fix.

Be in touch
Markus

Hi @ivarsvids 

sorry for the silence. A lot of things going on at the moment. But this topic is most definitely on our agenda.
And I have good news: the team is confident that this can be resolved in the current, ongoing sprint and be released with the next version update. Once I got a PR, I will let you know here and be glad for your feedback on it, before we merge it.

Best regards
Markus

Hi @ivarsvids 

this was blocked for a bit longer because we are doing some fundamental work on the desktop app. I hope that it can be resolved now in September. Apologies it takes a bit longer, but we will address it.

Best
Markus

Hi @ivarsvids 

thanks for your patience and again for reporting this one. We have merged a fix recently: https://github.com/RocketChat/Rocket.Chat.Electron/pull/1710

As a thanks: I would like to mention you in our whitehat security hall of fame, are you interested? if so, please let me know your contact details, https://docs.rocket.chat/contributors/contributing/security#whitehat-hall-of-fame 
also: I would like to send you a gift card for our Rocket.Chat shirt shop. Please let me know if you are interested and I send you a code to redeem.

Thanks for helping to make Rocket.Chat more secure!

Best Regards
Markus
